product_name: Darn Tough Thermolite Cushioned Ski Socks - Men's
long_description: With padding at the shins, along the bottoms and around the toe boxes, the men's Darn Tough Thermolite(R) Cushioned ski socks keep your feet comfortable during long days at the ski resort. Thermolite synthetic yarn is engineered to provide warmth and comfort with hollow-core fibers that trap body heat for great insulation; socks wick moisture and dry fast. Durable blend of Thermolite polyester, nylon, spandex and other fibers offers many seasons of use. Medium cushion on the bottom of the foot and around the toe box pads your feet without negatively affecting the fit. Undetectable toe seams won't create hot spots and cause blisters. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With padding at the shins, along the bottoms and around the toe boxes, the men's Darn Tough Thermolite(R) Cushioned ski socks keep your feet comfortable during long days at the ski resort.
